Description: Foot and wall sherd of Attic(?) black-glazed pottery bowl; flaring ring foot with convex outer face; glazed save for centre of underside with circle and a dot in black glaze; incised inscription on underside.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 484)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1794)
